item.description:
My Dear Friends!

First of all I want to apologize for canceling last month's meetup on such a short notice. I had to fly home to take care of my mother, who suddenly had become ill. No worries though, she is doing much better now and I am happy to be back in the States and getting together with you again on the 22nd. If only you have time :-).

Comon down to RiRa's to catch up, to have a few beers and maybe some delicious dinner. I would love to see many of the old faces and certainly would love to welcome some of the many new members who have joined our group lately.

So hope to see you in a couple of weeks! Take care and enjoy the spring and the beautiful weather until then.
item.name: April's Stammtisch!!
